statements: SELECT * FROM content_revisions;
SELECT content_id, content FROM content_revisions WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT revision_id, revision_date, author_id FROM content_revisions WHERE content_id = 5 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE content LIKE '%important%' AND author_id = 3;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) as revision_count FROM content_revisions GROUP BY author_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, revision_date FROM content_revisions WHERE author_id = 2 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_id FROM content_revisions WHERE content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT content_id, author_id FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author_id ASC, revision_date DESC;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(revision_id) AS total_revisions FROM content_revisions GROUP BY author_id HAVING total_revisions > 3 ORDER BY total_revisions DESC, author_id;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions;
SELECT id, content, revision_number, created_at FROM content_revisions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content, revision_number FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number > 5;
SELECT id, content FROM content_revisions WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, revision_number, created_at FROM content_revisions ORDER BY revision_number ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number = 1
SELECT content, created_at FROM content_revisions ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT content_id, COUNT(*) AS total_revisions FROM versioning_info GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_revisions > 2
SELECT * FROM versioning_info WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT version_id, version_name, content FROM versioning_info INNER JOIN content_revisions ON versioning_info.revision_id = content_revisions.id
SELECT id, content, author FROM ContentRevisions;
SELECT revision_number, author, created_at FROM ContentRevisions WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT revision_number, change_description, changed_by FROM RevisionHistory ORDER BY changed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentRevisions WHERE revision_number = 10;
SELECT action_performed, performed_by, performed_at FROM AuditTrail WHERE action_performed = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY performed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentRevisions;
SELECT id, content, author FROM RevisionHistory ORDER BY changed_at DESC;
SELECT revision_id, change_description, changed_by FROM RevisionHistory WHERE revision_number > 5;
SELECT id, author, created_at FROM ContentRevisions WHERE author = 'Alice' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT audit_id, action_performed FROM AuditTrail WHERE performed_by = 'Bob' ORDER BY performed_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number = 5;
SELECT revision_content, revision_date FROM content_revisions WHERE revised_by = 'Alice';
SELECT id, revision_number, revised_by FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT revision_content FROM content_revisions ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, MAX(revision_number) AS latest_revision FROM content_revisions GROUP BY content_id;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number > 5 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT revision_content FROM content_revisions WHERE revised_by='Alice' AND revision_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT cr.revision_number, rv.version_date FROM content_revisions cr INNER JOIN revision_versions rv ON cr.id=rv.revision_id;
SELECT rct.content_id, cr.revision_number FROM revision_control rct LEFT JOIN content_revisions cr ON rct.content_id=cr.content_id;
SELECT cr.revision_content, rat.revision_action FROM content_revisions cr INNER JOIN revision_audit_trail rat ON cr.id=rat.revision_id ORDER BY rat.action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content, revision_number FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT revision_id, editor_id, edited_at FROM revision_metadata WHERE revision_id = 10 AND editor_id = 20;
SELECT id, revision_id, action FROM revision_history WHERE action = 'update' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, notes FROM audit_trail WHERE action IN ('create', 'delete') ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM content_revisions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content, revision_number, created_at FROM content_revisions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT r.content, r.revision_number, m.editor_id, m.edited_at FROM content_revisions r JOIN revision_metadata m ON r.id = m.revision_id;
SELECT v.version_number, v.content, a.action FROM version_control v JOIN audit_trail a ON v.id = a.id WHERE a.action = 'updated';
SELECT h.revision_id, h.revision_number, h.action, h.timestamp, r.content FROM revision_history h JOIN content_revisions r ON h.revision_id = r.id ORDER BY h.timestamp ASC;
